8292.HK.summary: Worldgate Global Logistics Ltd., an investment holding company, provides integrated logistics solutions to customers worldwide. It operates in two segments, Freight Forwarding and Related Services, and Trading of Used Mobile Phones. The company offers air/sea freight forwarding and related services, such as import and export air and sea freight cargo space, customs clearance, local trucking and haulage to and from seaport and customers/warehouses, and other services related to air and sea freight; and trucking, haulage, and warehousing and related services. It also provides supply chain management services, including pick and pack, distribution, stock and inventory report, security escort, and tracking services. In addition, the company engages in trading used mobile phones. Worldgate Global Logistics Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Puchong, Malaysia.
